subject: Tennis
French Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Virginie Razzano of France lost in straight sets at the French Open on Tuesday, eight days after her fiancé, Stephane Vidal, died at age 32 of a brain tumor.
snippet: Virginie Razzano of France lost in straight sets at the French Open on Tuesday, eight days after her fiancé, Stephane Vidal, died at age 32 of a brain tumor.
